channel.title: Pages on Tony Tsai
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Tony Tsai

item.title: Single Page
item.description: This is a single page. To create a page similar to this: Create a new markdown file in contents/page/about.md. Alternatively, create a page bundle contents/page/about/index.md. In the frontmatter of the page, set the value of url to your desired relative path. E.g., for this page we have url = "/about/". Now you can access the website at baseurl/about and you can link to it from the main menu or sidebar using the relative path.
